exceptions.tactic: apply binary_le_sum_powers_inv in Hm as [a [Ha1 Ha2]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {g : nat -> nat | m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) /\\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}" on hypothesis of type "m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)".
The reference a was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros Hpq Hf He Hm. apply binary_le_sum_powers_inv in Hm as [a [Ha1 Ha2]]. - exists a. split; auto. intros i Hi. specialize (Ha2 i Hi). eapply power_decomp_lt with (p:=p) (q:=q) (f:=f) (a:=a) (n:=n); eauto. - intros i Hi. eapply power_decomp_lt; eauto. - intros i j Hij. eapply sinc_injective; eauto.
